bioRad
  • Tutorials
    • Create PPI plots from polar volume files
    • Load bird profiles into bioRad from ENRAM data repository
  • Functions

Reference version 0.2.13

Loading data

h5ODIMobject

Check ODIM HDF5 data class

readvp.list

Read a list of vertical profiles from multiple files

readvp.table

Read vertical profiles from vol2bird stdout

Polar volume (`pvol`)

read.pvol

Read a polar volume (pvol) from file

summary is.pvol

Class 'pvol': polar volume

is.pvolfile

Check whether file is a polar volume

Polar scan

getscan

Extract a scan from a polar volume

summary is.scan dim

Class 'scan': polar scan

summary is.param

Class 'param': polar scan parameter

Projecting scans as a plan position indicator (`ppi`)

ppi

Make a plan position indicator (ppi)

[.ppi

Class 'ppi': plan position indicator

composite

Make a composite of multiple plan position indicators (ppi objects)

Overlaying radar scans on a map

map

Map a plan position indicator (ppi)

basemap

Grab a basemap for a ppi

Processing vertical profiles (`vp`) from polar volume data (`pvol`)

rsl2odim

convert RSL polar volume to ODIM hdf5 format

vol2bird

Calculate a vertical profile of birds (VPB)

Vertical profile (`vp`)

readvp

Read a vertical profile (vp) from file

is.vpfile

Check whether file is a vertical profile

c

concatenate vp objects into a vplist object

plot

Plot a vertical profile

summary is.vp dim

Class 'vp': vertical profile

summary.vplist

Class 'vplist': list of vertical profiles

Vertical profile attributes

rcs

Radar cross section

rcs<-

Set radar cross section

Vertical profile time series (`vpts`)

bind

Bind vertical profiles into time series objects

vpts

Convert list of vertical profiles to time series (vpts) objects

regularize

Regularize a time series

plot

Plot a time series of vertical profiles

summary is.vpts dim

Class 'vpts': time series of vertical profiles

Migration traffic and vertical integration

vintegrate

Vertically integrate profiles

mtr

Migration traffic rate

mt

Migration traffic

cmt

Cumulative migration traffic

plot

Plot vertically integrated profiles

Thresholding attributes

sd_vvp

threshold VVP-retrieved radial velocity standard deviation

sd_vvp<-

Set threshold for VVP-retrieved radial velocity standard deviation

Radar and scan geometry

beamheight

Radar beam height

beamwidth

Radar beam width

elangle

Elevation angle of scan(s)

Converting reflectivity and reflectivity factor

dbz2eta

Convert reflectivity factor to reflectivity

eta2dbz

Convert reflectivity to reflectivity factor

Sunrise and sunset functions

suntime

Calculate sunrise and sunset

night

Calculate whether it is night at a geographic location and time

day

Test a bioRad object for night time

Extracting data from bioRad objects

fetch

fetch a profile quantity

as.data.frame

Coerce Vertical Profile Time Series to a Data Frame

Docker interface

checkDocker

Checks that Docker is running

updateDocker

Update Docker image for vol2bird
